sector.narrative: Provision of (formal and non-formal) multiple-levels or alternative pathways of education (including in temporary learning spaces)
Provision of multiple-levels (or alternative pathways of education) teacher training
System strengthening - community participation and social accountability, e.g. school management committees
System strengthening - inclusive education for other vulnerable children poorest quintile, ethnic/linguistic minorities, migrant children, non-citizens/undocumented children etc.
Technical assistance - Equitable access to quality education

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Un système intersectoriel de coordination est mis en place pour l’orientation et la mise à niveau des garçons et les filles hors de l’école

description.narrative:
Le plaidoyer en faveur des enfants hors de l'école lors de la tenue d'un panel de haut niveau a été un moment fort de la célébration du 30e anniversaire de CDE. La fonctionnalité des Mahadras pilotes s'ajoute au dispositif en place et crée une alternative en faveur de l'insertion scolaire.
| Status:On-track | As-of Date:07/02/2020

title.narrative: Number of Mahadras that deliver ameliorated curriculum
Service Delivery - Out of school children in the reporting year who participated in early learning, primary or secondary education through UNICEF supported programmes
Existence of a strategic policy document for the reinsertion and autonomization of out of school children
